en_question:
5.12 There are four individuals — X, Y, Z, and R — and five tasks A, B, C, D, and F. The time (in unspecified units) each person needs to complete each task is shown in Table 5-3. Since there are more tasks than people, the following assignment conditions are considered:(a) One person may take on two tasks, while the other three people each handle one. (b) Either X or Z must take on two tasks, and Y and R each take one. (c) Each person completes one task, but tasks A and B must be completed, while one among C, D, or F may be left unassigned. Objective: For each scenario (a), (b), and (c), determine the assignment plan that results in the minimum total completion time. Table 5-3
Person / TaskABCDF
X2529314237
Y3938262033
Z3427284032
R2442362345
cn_question:
5.12有甲、乙、丙、丁四人和A、B、C、D、E五项任务。每人完成各项任务时间如表5-3所示。由于任务数多于人数，故规定（a)其中有一人可兼完成两项任务，其余三人每人完成一项；（b)甲或丙之中有－-完成两项任务，乙、丁各完成一项；（c)每人完成一项任务，其中A和B必须完成，C、D、E中可以有一项不完成。试分别确定总花费时间为最少的指派方案。 表5-3
人/任务ABCDF
甲2529314237
乙3938262033
丙3427284032
丁2442362345
